Reviews.Title: Small but....  Nice
Reviews.Author: CHRISTOS PANAYIDES
Reviews.Content: Sunction Mount for security camera and more..... is a small but  nice product for its category, I use it with my  photo camera and video camera  during the driving also  on windows inhouse for  shooting panoramic video for youtube.good price good product happy customers

Reviews.Title: Pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Max
Reviews.Content: I bought this mount so I could record my driving and whatnot. It's not the products fault, but it won't stick to my dash. The surface of my dash wont allow it to stick properly. I decided to stick it to the glass outside the car and it worked great. I was worried it would fall off but it didn't. Overall its a good product and holds my camera really tight.Not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice little cradle for my Sony HD camcorder
Reviews.Author: S. Verma "Sverma"
Reviews.Content: I am using this to record video while drive and it stick to its base on my dash board with out any problem.

Reviews.Title: It is a well built item
Reviews.Author: neighbor
Reviews.Content: I like this because it is a very sturdy quality item.  I attached it to the windshield to take video on a trip and it stayed attached.  The only problem is that it needs one more joint, because otherwise you have to take video upside down and flip it with software, or buy a plate to install on your dash to mount it to.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Book Carpenter
Reviews.Content: No fuss, no muss. Attach the suction cup to whatever will hold a suction cup, and it stays put. Then you can use the standard 1/4 X 20 screw to attach a camera or whatever else you want.

Reviews.Title: Mini cam suction cup
Reviews.Author: DANEST "Patrick"
Reviews.Content: Works great. Used it to mount my Roadhawk Dashcam. Very sturdy and durable. For the price, it's a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Nice little mount
Reviews.Author: CJ Postal
Reviews.Content: Great for the price. Doesn't mount to my dash, but once i figured out good angles for mounting it to my windshield it has worked great. I just prefer the black one i also ordered, they are identical, but the silver one just loks cheaper IMO.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: pacman
Reviews.Content: best bang for your buck works good took it for a 100 mph trip x4 did not fall of my action cam mounts on to it great

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Quickie Camera Mount
Reviews.Author: WXR watcher "Hooked on Amazon"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful Quickie Camera Mount and has a strong suction cup and costs a fraction of a similar models. The only reason I gave it four stars is that part of the base is plastic. I will buy more.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: LoFlyer
Reviews.Content: This thing works great with small digital cameras. If you have a larger DLSR I suspect it will be a little unsteady. For myself and the camera's I use, this thing is great!

Reviews.Title: Not built to last
Reviews.Author: pokeyg23
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a broken windshield mount for a dashcam.  It held to the windshield, but after a week in place, the glue between the suction cup and the plastic on the mount melted and it fell apart.  The suction cup actually melted to the windshield.  It was possible to peel off, but it took a little effort.  At least it came off clean.  Even before it melted, I wasn't incredibly happy with it.  It held the camera okay for front and back movement, and swinging side-to-side, but it wouldn't tighten to rotation, just letting the camera swivel with no resistance.  This might be alright for temporary placement, but I was looking for a semi-permanent mount for a dashcam, and it fell apart.

Reviews.Title: Nice little tripod
Reviews.Author: debaserphoto
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little handy device and extremely useful for videographers or video-bloggers. It can be attached to any window, glass or smooth surface. The suction is very powerful. I use it with my light Sony camcorder, but it can easily hold my heavier DSLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Instant dash cam
Reviews.Author: daveski
Reviews.Content: I use this to mount my Canon Powershot upside down in my car. The camera is hung just in front of the rearview mirror.  All I do is revert the playback to correct it. I have several good vids for You Tube. I would give it five stars but I don't think it would not take any kind of abuse. But for my use it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jopn
Reviews.Content: Does the job works for great holds my dash cam well and will buy again when needed would of wanted all in black but that is not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Handy
Reviews.Author: Racecar
Reviews.Content: This has been pretty handy so far, I can use it with a webcam, iPhone, Go Pro, on just about any smooth surface. Only down side is it can be a little temperamental if you don't prepare the surface thoroughly.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive mount.
Reviews.Author: Pez Collector
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a window mount for a dash cam.  It worked great for that purpose.  Very easy to adjust to exactly the angle I want.

Reviews.Title: niceEshop Mini Camera Suction Mount Tripod holder car wind screen Sliver
Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: Works great. Has been attached to my windshield for two weeks (temps from 15F to 70F so far) Hasn't loosened/fallen off. Easy to adjust to suit my needs.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensively great product.
Reviews.Author: mike d (that's me!)
Reviews.Content: All in all, this product works just as expected.  For less than 5 bucks this little thing is well worth the money.  It stuck to my windshield great, it did fall off once when I was trying to first attach it.  However I think it was more user error, I may not have had a good suction.  Since then, it has stayed on for weeks so far.I first bought it because I also bought a "Timetec Road Hawk 1080P HD" dash camera and did not want to use the existing sticky pads on my window.  Making it difficult to transfer the camera from car to car.  The Suction Mount is great in that I can reposition the camera as many times as I want.I gave it 4/5 stars because the little nob that you need to tighten is made out of plastic.  It has not broken, but I suspect that it might after repeated loosening and tightening.

Reviews.Title: Great little mount.
Reviews.Author: Shadykennl
Reviews.Content: I love it !!  I have a Cannon FS 200 small camcorder that I use as a dashcam and it works great with this little camera mount. And the price? You can't beat it. Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Good Product with Limitations
Reviews.Author: William C. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a well made product that works great on horizontal surfaces, and up to 90 degrees vertically (although at that point it blocks the suction lever).  It will therefor not mount a camera in an upright position inside a sloped windshield as is.  Will keep it for other uses as the suction cup seems to hold well so far.

Reviews.Title: Hmm...it must be good for something
Reviews.Author: studfinder
Reviews.Content: I got this is because of AMAZON policy, "free shipping when order $25 or more" (not $35).  It came in the brown envelope and inside the plastic Ziploc.  It was dirty and scratch around the screw thread, and had a scuff mark at the suction cup.  Maybe the previous owner doesn't like it.... but it still is work well.  Try this product to mount the camera on the wind shield... no success.. but it might work when installed on the driver side window.  I plan to use this product for home remodeling such as lifting a bathroom mirror...it has a great suction.Bottom line...having this Mini Camera Suction is better than paying for shipping

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price
Reviews.Author: Popper
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical on this thing for the price but I have to say I'm impressed.  Suction cup holds well and the movement arm seems to hold it's position.  The only problem I had is I need to go 90 degrees on the bend and it came up a little short so I had to get out the dremel but I still gave 5 stars just because it was so inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: Perfect to use with IP Cameras
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Perfect to use with IP Camera, holds well on window, I am happy I could use this instead of drilling holes for camera mount.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: ioBuddha
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a ContourHD dash cam. A well made product. It works as described and was not priced bad. The quality is what sold me and I will keep this brand in mind next time I do my shopping.

Reviews.Title: very workable suction mount
Reviews.Author: David Byler
Reviews.Content: I use it regularly and probably out to get me another one for a spare.only problem I've had is in the 100+ F heat in my location - and that'snot the mount's fault.  In the heat must watch to be sure its still stuck.In the mornings and late afternoons this thing works like a charm andreally a deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: good suction
Reviews.Author: Luckycuss
Reviews.Content: The cup holds very good, it gives me a good angle for my video camra,and mounts right where I need it.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: UNDER DOG "GOTOGUY1979"
Reviews.Content: Seems to be made well, shipped quickly and was in good shape when it arrived, turns out I don't need it but because the price was so good I am going to keep it and use it for something later.

Reviews.Title: Does The Job
Reviews.Author: Phil Logan-kelly "Phil Logan-Kelly"
Reviews.Content: With my camera I can't mount this on the window so it must be used upright.  I have a bean bag type base that I use for my GPS and it works just great for this mount.  I find that once I dampen the rubber I have no trouble with the mount coming loose.One challenge I see is that I can't seem to tighten the ball mount tight enough to lock in place.  It is tight enough, at least so far, to keep the camera in place.

Reviews.Title: not meeting my original intention
Reviews.Author: J. xu
Reviews.Content: It is holding my digital camera upside down under the windshield thus not doing what I want.  Currently it is just sitting in my pile of junks not being used.

Reviews.Title: Great....really works
Reviews.Author: Aaron d Lewis
Reviews.Content: ----HAST thou then survived--  Mild Offspring of infirm humanity,  Meek Infant! among all forlornest things  The most forlorn--one life of that bright star,  The second glory of the Heavens?--Thou hast,  Already hast survived that great decay,  That transformation through the wide earth felt,  And by all nations. In that Being's sight  From whom the Race of human kind proceed,  A thousand years are but as yesterday;  10  And one day's narrow circuit is to Him
